text:
Created attachment 32583
Diff to http://httpd.apache.org/dev/devnotes.html

Sorry if I've reported this against wrong component, please reassigned as required.

I notice there is gendered reference to "he" in 
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/devnotes.html

"Developer checks out a copy of the files on which he wants to work"

Attached suggested patch, that replaces with "they", that is consistent with the rest of the document.

Thanks
creator: peter@greenhac.org.uk

text: There's several other instances of the same thing in that doc. Applying your patch, and fixing the others, also.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
rbowen@apache.org
text: Committed revision 1667319. Publishing site now. Thanks.
